title: How to Make a Fruity Fresher Smoothie

steps.headline: Chop and juice the apples and oranges.
steps.description: Peel the skin off of the oranges since citrus fruit skins are difficult to pulp.

steps.headline: Peel the banana and cut it in half.
Add in the strawberries, raspberries, and blueberries to the blender as well.
Blend for 45 seconds or until the drink is smooth.
Pour the smoothie into the mason jar and add a straw.

text: Chop and juice the apples and oranges. Peel the skin off of the oranges since citrus fruit skins are difficult to pulp. Peel the banana and cut it in half. Put it in the blender Add in the strawberries, raspberries, and blueberries to the blender as well.  Add some ice.  Blend for 45 seconds or until the drink is smooth.  Pour the smoothie into the mason jar and add a straw.  Finished.
